price: Gara lubbuulee isaanii deebi’anii “isin isinumatu miidhaa raawwattoota” jedhan.
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
